Entries.DialogueText: What a lovely occasion... It's always a joy to visit Stardew Valley.
Entries.DisplayPattern: What a lovely occasion... It's always a joy to visit Stardew Valley.

Entries.DialogueText: I must speak to the missus about purchasing a vacation home here.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I must speak to the missus about purchasing a vacation home here.

Entries.DialogueText: I eagerly anticipate my visit to Stardew Valley each year. There's a palpable charm in the air!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I eagerly anticipate my visit to Stardew Valley each year. There's a palpable charm in the air!

Entries.DialogueText: Of course! I've been looking forward to this all year.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Of course! I've been looking forward to this all year.

Entries.DialogueText: ... {Portrait:Happy}
Hmm... It's a bit tangy... but actually, the flavor is quite good!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hmm... It's a bit tangy... but actually, the flavor is quite good!

Entries.DialogueText: Just one minute... there's something in my bowl... what's this? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Just one minute... there's something in my bowl... what's this?

Entries.DialogueText: This... This is outrageous! {Portrait:Happy}
I've never been so insulted in all my life! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I've never been so insulted in all my life!

Entries.DialogueText: Blech... my tongue is swelling up... I think I'm going to be sick. {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Blech... my tongue is swelling up... I think I'm going to be sick.

Entries.DialogueText: Hmmm... Well it's not bad, but it's missing something... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hmmm... Well it's not bad, but it's missing something...

Entries.DialogueText: Did everyone in town contribute an ingredient to the soup? I feel like it's missing someone's unique voice.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Did everyone in town contribute an ingredient to the soup? I feel like it's missing someone's unique voice.

Entries.DialogueText: Oh my... that's the best soup I've ever tasted! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh my... that's the best soup I've ever tasted!

Entries.DialogueText: Ah... that's a very pleasant soup. The produce from this valley never disappoints!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ah... that's a very pleasant soup. The produce from this valley never disappoints!

Entries.DialogueText: Hmm... I don't have much to say about this. It's an average soup.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hmm... I don't have much to say about this. It's an average soup.

Entries.DialogueText: Um... It's actually kind of disgusting. I think I'll pass on the soup this year. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Um... It's actually kind of disgusting. I think I'll pass on the soup this year.

Entries.DialogueText: Blech! This is vile! I think I'm going to be sick... {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Blech! This is vile! I think I'm going to be sick...

Entries.DialogueText: I need to lie down... {Portrait:Unique}
I would be delighted! I've been eyeing the soup all afternoon.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I would be delighted! I've been eyeing the soup all afternoon.

Entries.DialogueText: ... {Portrait:Happy}
